ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | prdsbasmpt.y | |- Y = ( S Xs_ R ) |
| 2 |  | prdsbasmpt.b | |- B = ( Base ` Y ) |
| 3 |  | prdsbasmpt.s | |- ( ph -> S e. V ) |
| 4 |  | prdsbasmpt.i | |- ( ph -> I e. W ) |
| 5 |  | prdsbasmpt.r | |- ( ph -> R Fn I ) |
| 6 |  | prdsbasmpt.t | |- ( ph -> T e. B ) |
| 7 |  | prdsbasprj.j | |- ( ph -> J e. I ) |
| 8 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_prdsbas2 | |- ( ph -> B = X_ x e. I ( Base ` ( R ` x ) ) ) |
| 9 | 6, 8 | #P_eleqtrd | |- ( ph -> T e. X_ x e. I ( Base ` ( R ` x ) ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_elixp2 | |- ( T e. X_ x e. I ( Base ` ( R ` x ) ) <-> ( T e. _V /\ T Fn I /\ A. x e. I ( T ` x ) e. ( Base ` ( R ` x ) ) ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_simp3bi | |- ( T e. X_ x e. I ( Base ` ( R ` x ) ) -> A. x e. I ( T ` x ) e. ( Base ` ( R ` x ) ) ) |
| 12 | 9, 11 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> A. x e. I ( T ` x ) e. ( Base ` ( R ` x ) ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( x = J -> ( T ` x ) = ( T ` J ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( x = J -> ( R ` x ) = ( R ` J ) ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( x = J -> ( Base ` ( R ` x ) ) = ( Base ` ( R ` J ) ) ) |
| 16 | 13, 15 | #P_eleq12d | |- ( x = J -> ( ( T ` x ) e. ( Base ` ( R ` x ) ) <-> ( T ` J ) e. ( Base ` ( R ` J ) ) ) ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_rspcva | |- ( ( J e. I /\ A. x e. I ( T ` x ) e. ( Base ` ( R ` x ) ) ) -> ( T ` J ) e. ( Base ` ( R ` J ) ) ) |
| 18 | 7, 12, 17 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> ( T ` J ) e. ( Base ` ( R ` J ) ) ) |
